roleset.name: to make an indentation
roleset.note: INDENT-V NOTES: Roleset based on parallel entries to VN, PB and sense groupings. Framed by Claire. No appropriate VN entry found. (from indent.01-v)

example.name: paragraph
example.text: You will notice that I indented the paragraph, and that it is double-spaced.

example.name: make a dent
example.text: She indented the tender bark of the cottonwood shoots.
example.arg: the tender bark of the cottonwood shoots

roleset.name: indenture as servent
roleset.note: INDENT-V NOTES: Roleset based on parallel entries to VN, PB and sense groupings. Framed by Claire. No appropriate VN entry found. (from indent.02-v)

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Disguising himself as a houseboy, he indented himself to a rich household.
